2098430.name: Shujinkou Original Soundtrack
2098430.description:
Dive into the world of Shujinkou's Original Soundtrack!

Experience the epic musical journey of Shujinkou with this monumental seven-disc soundtrack, featuring 158 tracks and nearly 7 hours of unforgettable music. This massive album spans over a dozen genres, including (but not limited to):

  • Classical, rock, metal, electronic, jazz, lounge and gypsy music

  • Middle Eastern desert melodies and East Asian influences, including Japanese and Chinese traditional music

Immerse yourself in heart-pounding battle themes, sweeping character motifs, and emotional boss music, alongside instrumental versions of vocal tracks and tracks that have multiple variations (each with unique solos and arrangements). Minigame tracks, battle tracks, and more have Shu, Jin, and Kou's powerful melodic motifs expertly arranged and integrated to create an immersive listening experience.

Composed by several world-class composers and artists from the USA and Japan, brought to life by over a dozen live performers, and mastered by Warner Music Japan, the Shujinkou Original Soundtrack is an extraordinary six-year collaboration that celebrates the heart and soul of Shujinkou.

From start to finish, it’s a thrilling musical experience you won’t forget.

Label: Rice Games Inc

Lead Composer: Brian LaGuardia

Composers: Brian LaGuardia, Robert Mullis, Ryo Noguchi, Frank Tedesco, Masaki Takao, Kana Kitada, Julian Rice

Mastering Engineer: Ryuuichi Tanaka, Warner Brothers Japan (LABMAS)
